title: Idle load balancer idle-elb
commands: aws elbv2 describe-load-balancers --names idle-elb; # Review and consider deleting if truly unused

title: Unattached EBS volume unattached-volume
suggested_action: Delete unused volume or attach to instance
commands: aws ec2 describe-volumes --volume-ids vol-0123456789abcdef0; aws ec2 delete-volume --volume-id vol-0123456789abcdef0

title: Unattached EBS volume backup-volume
suggested_action: Delete unused volume or attach to instance
commands: aws ec2 describe-volumes --volume-ids vol-0987654321fedcba0; aws ec2 delete-volume --volume-id vol-0987654321fedcba0

title: Unused Elastic IP unused-eip
commands: aws ec2 describe-addresses --allocation-ids eipalloc-0123456789; aws ec2 release-address --allocation-id eipalloc-0123456789

title: EC2 web-server-1 under 8.5% median CPU (7d)
suggested_action: Consider downsizing to smaller instance type or schedule off-hours stop
commands: aws ec2 describe-instances --instance-ids i-0123456789abcdef0; # Consider resizing or stopping during off-hours
